mapper.select: select count(*) from inquiry where inquiry_status='Y'

select inquiry_no , inquiry_title , inquiry_content , to_char(inquiry_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') inquiry_date , inquiry_type , member_id , inquiry_process , inquiry_email from inquiry join member on(member_no = inquiry_writer) where inquiry_status='Y' order by inquiry_no desc

select inquiry_no , inquiry_title , to_char(inquiry_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') inquiry_date , inquiry_content , inquiry_type , member_id , inquiry_answer , inquiry_email from inquiry join member on(member_no = inquiry_writer) where inquiry_no = #{bno}
mapper.update: update inquiry set inquiry_process = 'Y' where inquiry_no = #{inquiryNo}
